basics.name: Tee Yong Jian
basics.label: Fullstack Software Developer
basics.summary: I am currently pursuing a Bachelor of Computer Science (Computer Development) at Universiti Teknikal Malaysia Melaka (UTeM). I am passionate about software engineering and expect to graduate in 2027.

education.institution: Universiti Teknical Malaysia Melaka, Malaysia, UTeM

highlights: Participated in various renovation projects, including demolition, framing, drywall installation,and finishing.
Assisted senior workers in executing renovation plans and adhered to safety protocols
Writing and editing technical documentation, such as user manuals, guides, and FAQS, in clear and concise language.
Organizing and structuring complex information into user-friendly formats, such as online help systems or knowledge bases.

work.summary: Operating as an independent contractor to support engineering teams with technical documentation and system analysis.
highlights: Analyzed complex software architectures to produce high-quality technical manuals and user guides.
Translated technical codebase requirements into user-friendly FAQs and knowledge bases for non-technical stakeholders.
Collaborated remotely with engineering teams to document system workflows and API functionality.
Improved internal documentation structure, resulting in faster onboarding for new technical staff.

volunteer.summary: Actively involved in fundraising initiatives and food donation programs to support underprivileged families.
highlights: Collaborated with the team to organize fundraising campaigns, successfully raising funds for local community support.
Coordinated the logistics of food donation drives, including collecting, sorting, and distributing essential supplies to those in need.
Engaged with donors and community members to raise awareness about social welfare projects.

awards.title: STPM Academic Excellence Award
awards.summary: Recognized for outstanding academic performance in STPM (Form 6) for achieving a CGPA of 3.84

awards.title: Dean's List Award
awards.summary: Achieved Dean's List recognition for all completed semesters to date (Semester 1 to 5), consistently maintaining a GPA above 3.70.

awards.title: Third Place - SULAM X PINEAPPLE FARM DIGITALIZATION
awards.summary: Developed a mobile application designed to improve and digitalize the pineapple purchasing process in Malaysia, bridging the gap between local farmers and consumers.
